ai-patthana16.71:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.71:0.3_0: Taking the true nature of a mind that is internally arisen,
ai-patthana16.71:1.1_0: Not longing for the sake of non-existence, those mind gives rise to the higher mind.
ai-patthana16.71:1.1_1: This is the section in brief.
